Okay, so it's an excuse to send another test message through, but still a valid question.  Do we have any musical people here among us?  Anyone written any songs related to the Shinsengumi?  I have someone over on my Cult of Hephaestion list who, with a partner, composed an entire musical based on Alexander the Great and was having it performed off-Broadway.  I don't know... somehow I just can't envision Saitou singing a solo or the entire Shinsengumi breaking into a dance against the Ishin Shishi a la West Side Story...
 
phil (it had better WORK this time or I'm calling in the gatotsu expert...)
